FuncDef:
The auto-source-trace statistics interval command sets the packet sampling interval for proactive source tracing.
The undo auto-source-trace statistics interval command restores the default packet sampling interval. The auto-source-trace statistics interval command sets the packet sampling interval for proactive source tracing. The undo auto-source-trace statistics interval command restores the default packet sampling interval. By default, the packet sampling interval is 10 seconds.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the packet sampling interval for proactive source tracing.
The value is an integer that ranges from 10 to 60, in seconds.

ExtraInfo: You can run the auto-source-trace statistics interval command to set a proper packet sampling interval based on your site requirements.
